author: raghu.thakur
title: Dapp for Art & Creator Discovery
description: Only 3% of artists are able to get discovered and digitally promote their art and talent. Crypto adoption among the artists is 0.004%.
solution: Decentralized discovery of art & the creator with Social network. 10 times more crypto adoption by artists & clients at 91% lesser cost.
experience: Bluetook operational for 1+ year & hosts 1700+ artists, 50k curated images. Founders include Artists, Tech & Management with 17 Patents.
